text: Sasha K. Gordon [given name, Oksana Tischenko] is a Ukrainian born actress residing in New York City. She is most noted for her performance in the 2015 film Natasha,"Charismatic unknown makes Natasha special". Now, May 4, 2016. for which she garnered a Canadian Screen Award nomination for Best Actress at the 5th Canadian Screen Awards in March 2017."Orphan Black, Schitt's Creek, Kim's Convenience up for Canadian Screen Awards". CBC News, January 17, 2017.Canadian Screen Awards 2017: Full list of nominees == Early life == Born and raised in Odessa, Ukraine,"Interview with Sasha K. Gordon". IndieActivity. She moved to the United States at age 16. Саша К. Гордон: Я знаю, что правильная роль придёт == Education == Gordon studied marketing and finance at Fordham University, and acting at the Bruce Ornstein Acting Workshop. == Career == Gordon is also a stage actress with the Wednesday Repertory Company in New York City and performed in the off-Broadway play Terezin."TheaterScene"."Review: Terezin by Ron Cohen" Sasha's favorite actors are Andrei Mironov, Meryl Streep, Robert De Niro, and Ben Kingsley.Oleg Sulkin.
